channel.title: SRVUSD BOE Podcast
channel.description: Unofficial Podcast of San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education Meetings
channel.itunes:author: Scott Goodrow
channel.itunes:subtitle: Unofficial Podcast of SRVUSD BOE Meetings
channel.itunes:summary: This is an unofficial podcast of the San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education meetings, provided for easier access.

item.title: 170613 SRVUSD BOE Meeting
item.description: June 13th, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education. 00:02:39 - 9.1 - Presentation - National Geographic Bee Finalist 00:05:12 - 9.2 - Public Comment for Non-Agenda Items 00:21:02 - 9.3 - Association President's Comments 00:23:20 - 9.4 - School Climate Update 01:27:26 - 10.2 - Public Hearing for the Proposed 2017-18 District Budget 01:32:08 - 10.3/4/5 - Disclosure/Approval of the Major Provisions of the 2016-17 CSEA #65/II/III 01:37:26 - 10.6/7 - Disclosure/Approval of the Major Provisions of the 2016-17 SEIU #1021 01:41:20 - 10.8/9 - Hearing/Approval of SRVUSD SELPA Plan for 2017-18 01:45:50 - 10.10/11 - Consideration of Approval of New Position Descriptions for Executive Directors 01:47:41 - 12.1 - Board Member's Reports 01:56:19 - 12.2 - Superintendent's Report
item.itunes:subtitle: June 13th, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education.
item.itunes:summary: June 13th, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education. 00:02:39 - 9.1 - Presentation - National Geographic Bee Finalist 00:05:12 - 9.2 - Public Comment for Non-Agenda Items 00:21:02 - 9.3 - Association President's Comments 00:23:20 - 9.4 - School Climate Update 01:27:26 - 10.2 - Public Hearing for the Proposed 2017-18 District Budget 01:32:08 - 10.3/4/5 - Disclosure/Approval of the Major Provisions of the 2016-17 CSEA #65/II/III 01:37:26 - 10.6/7 - Disclosure/Approval of the Major Provisions of the 2016-17 SEIU #1021 01:41:20 - 10.8/9 - Hearing/Approval of SRVUSD SELPA Plan for 2017-18 01:45:50 - 10.10/11 - Consideration of Approval of New Position Descriptions for Executive Directors 01:47:41 - 12.1 - Board Member's Reports 01:56:19 - 12.2 - Superintendent's Report

item.title: 170523 SRVUSD BOE Meeting
item.description: May 23rd, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education. 00:06:52 - 9.1 - Presentations 00:20:07 - 9.2 - Student Board Member Report 00:27:50 - 9.3 - Public Comment for Non-Agenda Item 02:53:00 - 9.4 - Association President's Comments 03:00:16 - 10.1 - Resolution: Elimination and/or Reduction of Classified Positions 03:00:36 - 10.2 - Resolution: Approval of Telugu World Language for Academic Credit 03:00:56 - 10.3 - Update on Governor's 2017-18 May Revise Proposal 03:36:58 - 11.1 - TRAFFIX Update
